description: This lightly spiced dish infuses the squid with smoky sweet Asian flavour.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Squid Yakitori Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium white onions, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan on a medium heat, fry all of the sauce/marinade ingredients for 20 minutes until the sauce reduces by half.
Once the sauce has thickened, remove from the heat and separate into 2 bowls. 1 is for marinating the skewers and the other is for serving as a dip.
Butterfly and score the squid diagonally on both sides. Heat up a chargrill to a medium heat. Fry the squid on both sides for 1 minute each side.
Remove squid from the grill and dip into the marinade. Serve with the extra dipping sauce on the side and a choice of condiments.
